Protecting the  
Environment
Ziff Davis and our businesses are committed to operating in a manner 
that protects the environment, including reducing the Company’s 
use of natural resources and the generation of waste and emissions 
associated with our facilities and services. Our digital media 
properties and marketing technology products help millions of clients 
and customers shift to a paperless, green future.CH5:Environmental ManagementSOCIAL
GOVERNANCEINTRODUCTION
ENVIRONMENTAL
